AI Description: tqdm is a fast, extensible progress bar for loops and pipelines in Python. It provides a visual and text-based progress bar to indicate the progress of iterations.
Core Features: Easy To Integrate & Use In Python Scripts, Customizable Progress Bar With Different Styles & Features, Supports Both Vertical & Horizontal Bars, Allows Nested Progress Bars In Loops, Can Be Used With Any Iterable In Python
General Tags: Progress Bar, Python, Data Visualization, Productivity Tool
